data.convo: What's your favorite magazine ? Off hand , I'd say the Reader's Digests is my favorite . What kind of magazine is it ? It's instructive and inspiring . Really ? It is a weekly , isn't it ? No , it's a semimonthly . Does it enjoy popularity among the young generation ? Yes , it's so popular that it's sold out as soon as it reaches the bookstores . Oh , I think I should try to read one .
